content:
New Feature: Reduced lag when converting big jsons
New Feature: Improved UI
Bug Fixes: Fixed the old speed conversion (should be better)
Bug Fixes: Fixed the convert button not working
Alert: Incase you convert your game and your character spawns stuck into the void make sure the Server Physics Engine is set to Rapier 3D (in Editor>Configuration>Engine)
Alert: 'Unit Other Properties' option in settings is used only for testing purposes I do not recommend you use it
New Feature: Added projectile support.
New Feature: Added BETA script support.
